Ministers Need Some Financial Ability
 

     Ministers need business ability if they are to deal wisely with their churches.--A man who has no business tact may make a minister, but he will lack qualifications that every minister must possess in order to deal wisely in the church and build up the cause. But when a minister is good in the pulpit, and, like Elder Hull, fails in management, he should never go out alone. Another should go with him to supply his lack and manage for him.--1T 441.
